meta.name: Urban Coffee Roaster
meta.about:
Urban Coffee Roaster, established in 2014, is an authentic brand from Hong Kong. U.C.R. was co-founded by two coffee enthusiasts with a primary aim to supply freshly roasted coffee beans from carefully picked origins.
 
U.C.R. coffee beans and coffee drip bags are well perceived by home baristas who pursue quality home brewed coffee, as well as caf√©s and restaurants serving high quality coffee.
 
.
